nodes.text: The X2H-8 Overseer Droid was a model of supervisor droid that saw use during the Cold War. A number of X2H-8 Overseer Droids oversaw the work of S7-H7 Slicing Droids, BB-22 Salvage Droids, and JT-65 Salvage Droids in the Barasin Refuse Yards on the planet Balmorra.
X2H-8 Overseer Droids appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found in the Barasin Refuse Yards in the Imperial version of Balmorra.
